about_the_game: Embark on a short journey in "A Night With: Emily", an adult-only, erotic visual novel that brings a unusual twist to intimate storytelling. After your college friend send you a intimate photo, she would do everything she can so you delete the image. This game focuses on a single, intense night of exploration and discovery, where every interaction with Spirit reveals deeper layers of the story.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game is intended for mature audiences and features adult themes, including nudity, strong language, and scenes of a sexual nature. All characters depicted are over 18 years old, and interactions are based on consensual relationships developed through the storyline. The mature content is contextually integrated into the character arcs and overall narrative, enhancing the immersive experience while maintaining a respectful and thoughtful approach.

detailed_description: Embark on a short journey in "A Night With: Emily", an adult-only, erotic visual novel that brings a unusual twist to intimate storytelling. After your college friend send you a intimate photo, she would do everything she can so you delete the image. This game focuses on a single, intense night of exploration and discovery, where every interaction with Spirit reveals deeper layers of the story.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: A Night With: Emily

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended
